summary:
This mod adds a little funny Riekling Porter with an oversized Backpack ready to carry your weights after you do him a little favor... 

fully voice acted
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=5][b]This mod adds a little funny Riekling Porter with an oversized Backpack ready to carry your weights after you do him a little favor...[/b][/size]


[youtube]gSFVH5uOBGU[/youtube]
  
video by Seelux

[size=3][color=#daa520][i]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mini Spoiler description:

The Little Riekling is an outcast that is living alone by his own on his selfproclamed Wak Wak Island ...A small rocky Island in front of RavenRock

to be able to recruit him you need to make him a favor first...

The Riekling will then be willing to come with you ...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/i][/size][/color]

Reviews:

[youtube]3F-pFyzxGnc[/youtube]
By insane0hflex            

[youtube]b1sVWJfIeNA[/youtube]      
By Gopher
           
[youtube]hzqKWjoqfC4[/youtube]
by EGMNOW

[youtube]EJtn79BD8yA[/youtube]

By Brodual

SPOILER:
Here a small video playtrought on how to find the riekling By TWarrior
 
[youtube]3qgsI0KEsxY[/youtube]



[size=5]He will use the Dog companion slot so you will still be able to have another normal companion ...[/size]
[size=3]
This is a new version and replaces the early release that had a bug if youhad a follower , now shoudl be fixed, but is still better if you dismiss your dog companions befoure just in case ...[/size]

[size=5][color=#00ff00][i]The cute voice acting is performed by Guinolas[/i][/color][/size]


[size=3][color=#ff0000][i]Requires Dragonborn DLC[/i][/color][/size]

[i][size=1]
For who might have some problems due to advanced save games that may be corrupted by use of other followers or the like and have problems making the riekling follow you you cantry the following solution:
Go near the riekling and right befoure he contacts you open consolle and type
Setstage PROM_SLAVE 50
This will fastfoward the quest to completition ,reset followers and add him to followers list 
[/i][/size]

[size=4]
If you are interested in another Dragonborn DLC Here is  A mod that ADDS waves to all of Skyrim with HD texture ...
[color=#ff0000][i]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31686[/size][/i][/color]
author: Prometheus

files.name: Slave Pack Riekling Porter Goblin Variation By Tumbajamba
